de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.optics

Class ClusterOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result.AbstractHierarchicalResult
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result.BasicResult
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.optics.ClusterOrder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HierarchicalResult, OrderingResult, Result
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CorrelationClusterOrder

    public class ClusterOrder
extends BasicResult
implements OrderingResult
    Class to store the result of an ordering clustering algorithm such as OPTICS.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
